attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I wanted to download it but it said age restricted!! This is extremely unfair to the kids who don’t know any better and want to download this app. Then I figured out this app wants my location? CREEPY

attributes.title: Disgusting 🤢
attributes.review: I opened the app and i saw an old orange the app kept telling me to vote for bernie bc #barbzforbernie and when i swiped i saw an ugly hot cheeto that made me want to jump off a cliff and become a whale so i wouldnt have to see him ever again

attributes.title: Just doesn’t work
attributes.review: It takes a really long time to load and barely ever work sorry but it just need to be fixed

attributes.title: App
attributes.review: Unfortunately this app crashes my phone everytime I get on a game or any app it just crashes so I decided to delete the app and suddenly it stopped crashing

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: If I could rate this app less than one, I WOULD! Totally a waste of time! The set up is so confusing and it freezes WAY TOO much. Please fix it by completely destroying it.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever used made my phone glitch and shut down constantly. Even got spam from it. My phone is completely messed up now after using it.

attributes.title: told me LIES💔💔
attributes.review: this app told me that i was going to meet and become mutuals with Ariana Grande. guess what, IT DIDNT HAPPEN 😾😾 this app lies and only talks about an orange racist/rapist. don’t download this app, you will be extremely disappointed by the outcome 😿😿 literally anyone else for president 2020✨✨✨

attributes.title: Fat Cheeto man app 🥰
attributes.review: i soooo wanted this app so I could keep up to date on my homophobic, racist, pedophilic, misogynistic president, but it’s suuuuuch a bad app 😫 like why is there nothing about how crusty and gross he is? anyways 1 star don’t download unless you’re a dummyhead ❤️

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: this app makes your phone glitch and u can barely stay on the website for 5 minutes without being kicked out, TERRIBLE.

attributes.title: This app is awful for your phone
attributes.review: It keeps crashing my phone. I don’t know why Apple would even allow a bug ridden app like this on the App Store. I’m so disappointed.
